content: liven up your mornings and coffee breaks with cute crochet strawberry coasters materials - 1 skein lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - red - 1 skein lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - white - 1 skein lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - green - 5mm crochet hook - tapestry needle notes opt for cotton yarn for absorbency and heat resistance avoid melting-prone acrylic use size 4 worsted weight yarn or thinner to prevent instability the strawberry crochet coaster is approximately 4 5 inches tall and 4 inches wide suitable for most cups increase size with an extra row of increases if needed vary color with light pink or white strawberries variations you can change the red out for light pink or white to add some color variety to the strawberries
